entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
